about_the_game:
Step into the world of automotive sports mechanics with the Rally Mechanic Simulator: Prologue.
Test your skills and see if you have what it takes to manage the garage, handle parts and funds, and fix damaged rally cars. Tune them to perfection and take them to the rallies. Experience the challenges of bad weather, limited time, and fierce competition. Prove yourself and become the best rally mechanic.



Are you ready for the challenge?

Your journey begins with one car, two rallies, and a test track. See if you can handle the time pressure and turn a wreck into a winning rally car. Test your car on the track and compete for the best driving time using Steam Leaderboards.

Start to build your career
In the Rally Mechanic Simulator: Prologue, you will begin your journey towards becoming a top-tier rally mechanic. Experience the thrill of fixing and modifying cars while getting a taste of what's to come. This prologue is just the beginning, offering a glimpse into the exciting career that awaits you in the full version. Set the foundation for your future team, start negotiating your first sponsor deals, and manage the initial aspects of your career development. Get ready to step into a world of rally car mechanics and prepare for the full experience in Rally Mechanic Simulator.
It's not just a car, it's a rally car
Work with rally cars equipped with turbos, coilovers, proper tires, and performance transmissions. Keep an eye on the car's extra features and make it as good as possible to earn fans and money as part of a champion rally team.



Prologue features:
  • Prologue-exclusive: One car, two rallies, and a test track
  • Compete for the best driving time using Steam Leaderboards
  • Realistic rally car models with extensive interaction
  • Work on car electronics
  • Car damage and cleaning systems
  • Ability to paint and customize your cars
  • Equipped field workshop for on-the-go repairs
  • Advanced vehicle development system
  • Realistic graphics
  • Advanced car appearance personalization system
  • Timed repair segments
  • Extensive tuning options
  • Many achievements to unlock
  • and much more in the full version of Rally Mechanic Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 270X with 2GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Mobile GPUs are not officially supported, the game may work but we cannot guarantee it.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K / AMD Ryzen 7 1700X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Mobile GPUs are not officially supported, the game may work but we cannot guarantee it.
